name: Slimy Loop
description:
Your job is to rotate the loop inside an underground slime bunker and your stuck with it. In order to save the slimes, you need to guide them into the bunker through the loop and steer them away from traps and obstacles.




Controls:
A / D keys or Mouse Click and Drag to rotate the Maze Loop





Made for Ludum Dare 47 in 72hrs
Theme: Stuck in a loop
Game Design: Amir Ambojia
Programmer: Khaizter Topacio
Sound Design: Jehro Alcoba
